LanguageData.MpTickratesTargetSuperfastNothingHappeni: used only in situations where nothing is really happening - like no enemies, all colonists sleeping, etc.
LanguageData.MpTickratesTargetUltrafastTip: hidden speed useable with dev mode enabled - doesn't have an icon, can only be accessed with hotkeys.
LanguageData.MpTickratesWarnSameValue: please note - using the same value for multiple game speeds could cause some (minor) issues.
